---
title: "Leek & butter bean stew"
author: "[Napolina](https://napolina.com/recipes/butter-bean-stew/)"
categories: [stew, vegan]
description: "A hearty, store cupboard stew for winter"
---

- 1 onion
- 3 garlic cloves
- 3 leeks
- 1 chilli
- 2 tins chopped toms
- 1 tin cannellini beans
- 1 tin butter beans

1. Fry oil, garlic chill. Add leeks and cook for 5 min.
1. Add tomatoes and simmer for 20 min
1. Add beans and cook for 5 for min
